content: I was looking at the IHE XUA profile and trying to understand (as an IHE newbie) how, if at all, it can used or adapted for FHIR-based systems. As far as I can tell, it is not one of the profiles that exist in a FHIR flavor, e.g. it does not appear on the Category:FHIR page on the IHE wiki. Did I miss smt.? - or are there perhaps IHE alternatives that would work in a FHIRy/RESTy setting?
The FHIR alternative is OAuth2. There is a spec on how one could carry SAML tokens in OAuth2 if you're looking to bridge XDS.b and FHIR.
IUA is being revised, as the standards it has used have revised. There is indeed a method in IUA for carrying XUA assertions, if that is the desire.
@René Spronk @John Moehrke Thanks!
